title: Welcome to Your Public Library!
author: Government Websites by CivicPlus
cleaned_text: Your Public Library! Mission Statement The Nacogdoches Public Library connects people with information, ideas and experiences to provide enjoyment, enhance lives and strengthen our community. Regular Library Hours: Monday - Thursday, 9:00 am to 8:00 pm Friday, 9:00 am to 6:30 pm Saturday, 10:00 am to 4:00 pm Library Services Available: [Curbside Order-Ahead & Pick-Up](https://forms.gle/zAc7yVMF2zkNECoK7). You may order online at Order-Ahead & Pick-Up Order Form or by telephone at 936-559-2970. eBooks and eAudio books through Overdrive Please visit www.nactx.us for more information about other City facilities. For a complete listing of library programs, please look through the [Fall 2023 Activity Guide](https://www.nactx.us/DocumentCenter/View/5899/Parks-and-Rec-Activity-Guide?bidId=). Registration for programs not listed here can be found at eventbrite.com. [Storytime, Wednesdays, 10:00am](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/storytime-tickets-168442543181) [Resin Jewelry Catrinas Craft](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/696096081117?aff=oddtdtcreator), September 13, 6:30pm, all ages [Library Mini Golf & Giant Indoor Games](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/696103533407?aff=oddtdtcreator), September 15, 6:30pm, all ages [Prepaid College Savings Plans,](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/prepaid-college-plans-what-are-they-how-do-they-work-tickets-680106826827?aff=oddtdtcreator) September 20, 5:30pm, ages 19+ years [Intro to ChatGPT](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/696085539587?aff=oddtdtcreator), September 20, 5:30pm, ages 19+ years Log your 1000 Books Before Kindergarten books on [ReadSquared.](https://nacogdochespubliclibrary.readsquared.com/Default.aspx) Presenters and Vendors wanted! [Dia de los Muertos 2023 Vendor and Ofrenda Interest Form](https://forms.gle/3FjWupbysnG3vKXr5) Forms are not quite ready for the Día de Muertos festival, but let us know if you would like to receive information. The event is tentatively scheduled for Saturday, November 4th.
